players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Charlie was found dead.
Diana: "I think Bob is the mafioso. We should lynch him."
You: "Bob, I don't think you're the mafioso. Diana thinks so but we can't be sure yet. We should keep an eye on both of you and Charlie for now."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob

players.name: Bob
memory: The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Diana: "I think Bob is the mafioso. We should lynch him."
Alice: "Bob, I don't think you're the mafioso. Diana thinks so but we can't be sure yet. We should keep an eye on both of you and Charlie for now."

players.name: Diana
memory: The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
You: "I think Bob is the mafioso. We should lynch him."
Alice: "Bob, I don't think you're the mafioso. Diana thinks so but we can't be sure yet. We should keep an eye on both of you and Charlie for now."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
